name: Petaling Boardwalk

reviews.text:
ğŸŒ¿After walking across the scenic Tree Top Walk, the one-way Petaling Boardwalk lead back down to Sime Track, enroute passing by a few Shelter Hut.
ğŸŒ¿These shelters served as rest point and rain shelters.
ğŸ€Petaling Boardwalk is a more strenuous trail that involve climbing up and down stairs, plenty of them, before getting to a more level boardwalk.
ğŸŒ±At its lowest, the boardwalk span across a small stream, and then gradually leads back to Sime Track.
ğŸ€Petaling Boardwalk is the compulsory Trail down from Tree Top Walk.
ğŸŒ±Fun fact:
Petaling is the name of the Petaling Tree.
